column5: LOTS AND LOTS OF WALKIN TODAY!!! KEPT HEARING OF THIS BIG ICE STORM COMIN TONIGHT SO I THOUGHT I'D BETTER HEAD OUT TODAY!!! DIDNT EXPECT MUCH BUT ICE AND THATS WHAT I PRETTY MUCH GOT  LOL WATERS WERE UP JUST A TAD BUT FLOWIN FAST AND DIRTY(ABOUT 1"VIS) PUT ALOT OF TIME AND EFFORT IN ON SOME OPEN SPOT(FEW AND FAR BETWEEN  LOL) AND MANAGED 2. WITH THE WEATHER REPORT AS I HEARD IT LAST I MIGHT NOT EVEN TAKE LITTLE C TO SCHOOL LET ALONE GO FISHIN !!! BUT HEY IF YA KNOW ME I JUST MIGHT BE CRAZY ENOUGH TO GO (CLIFF WOULD AGREE  LOL)
First is a beauty! the second has a nasty looking scar. But two more than I got today
YA THOSE DARN LAMPREYS MAKE MY PRETTY FISH LESS PRETTY  LOL
TRIED THE PIER AND NOT A NIBBLE!!!!

Hey Scott!  It's great seeing some reports.  I know for a fact that if I went out today...even standing right beside you, I wouldn't have landed any...LOL.  Great job...you still have the touch, even in muddy waters.  Hey, I'm home tomorrow, maybe we should do some extreme steelhead fishing again...
Its that time of the year again! Beautiful steelheads, as always. Can't wait to see more reports from Canadian Copper.
Those are just beauty! I really have to learn how to do that. NICE!!!
Wow I'm surprised lampreys still exists. I haven't seen amy in years.  dsn
You obviously don't fish Lake Ontario very much... They're extremely common on Salmon.  I see Chinooks with 2 lampreys on them at the same time quite often.
